{{cpp/string/basic_string_view/title|remove_suffix}}
{{cpp/string/basic_string_view/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|
constexpr void remove_suffix( size_type n );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Moves the end of the view back by {{c|n}} characters.

The behavior is undefined if {{c|n &gt; size()}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|number of characters to remove from the end of the view}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string_view&gt;

int main()
{
    char arr[] = {'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', '\0', '\0', '\0'};
    std::string_view v(arr, sizeof arr);
    auto trim_pos = v.find('\0');
    if (trim_pos != v.npos)
        v.remove_suffix(v.size() - trim_pos);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Array: '" &lt;&lt; arr &lt;&lt; "', size=" &lt;&lt; sizeof arr &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; "View : '" &lt;&lt; v &lt;&lt; "', size=" &lt;&lt; v.size() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
Array: 'abcd', size=7
View : 'abcd', size=4
}}
